sentences.en: " Home " is a much more emotive word than " house ".
sentences.cn: home (家)是远比 house (住屋)更能激起感情的字眼.

sentences.en: Capital punishment is an emotive issue.
sentences.cn: 应否有死刑是个容易引起感情用事的问题.

sentences.en: Embryo research is an emotive issue.
sentences.cn: 胚胎研究是个容易引起激烈争论的问题。

sentences.en: Emotive thing and life bagatelle cannot confuse sth with sth else!
sentences.cn: 感情的事和生活琐事不能混为一谈!

sentences.en: How do I want ability to walk out of emotive shadow?
sentences.cn: 我要怎样才能走出感情的阴影?

sentences.en: Later on, trickier and more emotive subjects are tackled.
sentences.cn: 随后, 作者们讨论了更微妙、更情绪化的问题.

sentences.en: Oddly, given how emotive this dispute is, the Supreme Court has never settled it.
sentences.cn: 令人奇怪的是, 尽管争论是如此带有情绪化, 最高法院却从未能够解决这一问题.

sentences.en: Those who especially like or dislike cats would have strong emotive associations with cats.
sentences.cn: 那些特别喜欢或不喜欢猫的人可能对猫具有强烈的情绪记忆.

sentences.en: Try to collect examples of emotive, persuasive prose.
sentences.cn: 尽量收集富于情感 、 说服力强的散文范例.

sentences.en: We use emotive language to express our own attitudes and feelings.
sentences.cn: 我们用情感语言来表达自己的态度和感情.

words.tran_cn: 情绪的；易激动的；感动人的
没有情感的；不露情感的
感情上；情绪上；令人激动地；情绪冲动地
感情主义；诉诸感情；主情主义

trans.tran_cn: 感情的，情绪的，表现感情的
